title: Sins of Colonialism - Collection 13 (.. in Africa 3)
description:
Sins of Colonialism - Collection 13 (.. in Africa 3):

We have 31 titles here:

-  Abbas & Niyiragira (Eds.) - Aid to Africa; Redeemer or Coloniser (2009)

-  Bloom - French Colonial Documentary; Mythologies of Humanitarianism (2008)

-  Bond - Looting Africa; the Economics of Exploitation (2006)

-  Burgis - The Looting Machine; Warlords, Tycoons, Smugglers and the Systematic Theft of Africa's Wealth (2015)

-  Calvert - South-West Africa During the German Occupation, 1884-1914 (1915)

-  Clifford - German Colonies; a Plea for the Native Races (1918)

-  Connelly - A Diplomatic Revolution; Algeria's Fight for Independence and the Origins of the Post-Cold War Era (2002)

-  Conrad - Heart of Darkness (2007)

-  Cotula - The Great African Land Grab; Agricultural Investments and the Global Food System (2013)

-  Falola & Brownell (Eds.) - Landscape, Environment and Technology in Colonial and Postcolonial Africa (2012)

-  Freeman - Yaradee; a Plea for Africa; Slavery and Colonization (1836)

-  Grenouilleau (Ed.) - From Slave Trade to Empire; Europe and the Colonisation of Black Africa, 1780s-1880s (2004)

-  Hughes - Moving the Maasai; a Colonial Misadventure (2006)

-  Johnston - The Black Man's Part in the War (1917)

-  Law (Ed.) - From Slave Trade to Legitimate Commerce; the Commercial Transition in 19th-century West Africa (1995)

-  Memmi - Portrait of the Colonizer, Portrait of the Colonized (1965)

-  Meredith - The Fortunes of Africa; a 5000-Year History of Wealth, Greed, and Endeavor (2014)

-  Ndlovu-Gatsheni - Empire, Global Conloniality and African Subjectivity (2013)

-  Nutt - Damned Nations; Greed, Guns, Armies & Aid (2011)

-  Oliver & Atmore - Medieval Africa, 1250-1800 (2001)

-  Olusoga & Erichsen - The Kaiser's Holocaust; Germany's Forgotten Genocide and the Colonial Roots of Nazism (2010)

-  Osborn - Our New Husbands Are Here; Households, Gender, and Politics in a West African State from the Slave Trade to Colonial Rule (2011)

-  Penfold - Atrocities, Diamonds and Diplomacy; the Inside Story of the Conflict in Sierra Leone (2012)

-  Phillips - Another Man's War; the Story of a Burma Boy in Britain's Forgotten African Army (2014)

-  Roberts (Ed.) - The Colonial Moment in Africa; Essays on the Movement of Minds and Material 1900-1940 (1990)

-  Rodney - How Europe Underdeveloped Africa (1982)

-  Schmidt - Foreign Intervention in Africa; From the Cold War to the War on Terror (2013)

-  Shumway - The Fante and the Transatlantic Slave Trade (2011)

-  Svirsky & Bignall (Eds.) - Agamben and Colonialism (2012)

-  Turner - The Congo Wars; Conflict, Myth & Reality (2007)

-  Vandervort - Wars of Imperial Conquest in Africa, 1830-1914 (1998)
